title: zatc
author: zatc
content: https://zat.iohttps://twitter.com/zatdotioSOL, BTC, ETH, APE, LTC, ADA, DAI, BAT, USDT, USDC, BUSD, XMR, XRP, BCHhttps://i.imgur.com/S7bNGOS.png

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: So you basically just copied and pasted changelly's terms and conditions while editing out the Changelly name and replacing it with zat.ioChangelly's terms of service – https://changelly.com/terms-of-usezat.io terms of service – https://zat.io/terms (Archived)Why would anyone trust a service are not even able to write their own terms of service

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Creating a new thread instead of addressing what was pointed out in your previous thread is just digging an even deeper hole for yourself. Thanks for confirming that you have nothing to counter.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: This behaviour is stupid and indicates a lack of professionalism, everything in this forum is open and most of it is registered, so trying to delete the topic or open a new topic / new account will make things worse.I don't know, but you have to think well about trying to improve your reputation, which starts with answering these questions and changing some things on your site and then trying to gain trust.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Akhir-akhir ini sangat banyak pertukaran berbasis crypto baru, yang bermunculan dan beroperasi dan menawarkan bermacam-macam, tidak sedikit jika mereka/pemula tidak hati-hati terjebak dalam lingkaran scammers, Various missions they do to cheat, who definitely want to get legitimate money from their customers.There is not much to understand and draw conclusions about the Zat.io exchanges, whether they are legal or not.Of course, the OP should explain in detail about the Zat.io exchange here, to dispel any suspicions.

comments.author: stompix
comments.created_time: July 21, 2022, 07:16:28 PMLast edit: May 20, 2023, 07:35:52 PM by stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on July 21, 2022, 01:01:33 AMCreating a new thread instead of addressing what was pointed out in your previous thread is just digging an even deeper hole for yourself. Thanks for confirming that you have nothing to counter.Why are you so mean?It's clear this is a new exchange, the old was zat.gg and this one is zat.io!Obviously, it's....different!  I think he is trying to get rid of all zat.gg links, probably already scammed a few  and want to erase those traces, which is pretty stupid. He deleted the Twitter account and the youtube videos, but somehow he forgot about the other topic here Nice rates btw:

comments.author: logfiles
comments.created_time: July 22, 2022, 09:59:01 PMLast edit: July 19, 2023, 08:29:24 PM by logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on July 21, 2022, 07:16:28 PMI think he is trying to get rid of all zat.gg links, probably already scammed a few  and want to erase those traces, which is pretty stupid. Not forgetting that on that very Trustpilot page, there are a couple of 5 star positive reviews which were made on the same day just 2 minutes a part The first review was made at 10:49 PM The second review was made at 10:51 PM on the same day I'm giving Op a couple of days before i flag and tag his profile. His exchange is just one big fat lie.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: After reading all the replies, I won't dare to use this exchange at all. Because your footprint is full of shit and unprofessionalism. What the hell you don't know what should your terms & conditions. I know some parts of the Terms & Conditions would be the same, but you should write it your way without plagiarising others. This is a strong red flag for your exchange. So yea, I will suggest avoiding it.
